replies.context:
Meters are basically yards; 36" per yard  vs 39" for a meter.
 A kilogram is 2.2lbs, so just ask for half a kilo and you'll get a bit better than a pound at your butchers.
 A kilometer is .6 of a mile. So if you're driving in Canada and it says '100kmh' that's 60 MPH. If the signs say 50km per hour, that's 30mph. Do NOT drive at 100mph anywhere in Canada.
Fahrenheit to Celsius (aka centigrade) is more complicated......official formula is 'F degrees x 1.8 + 32 = degrees Celsius. (eg 30Celsius x 1.8 = 54 + 32 = 86F) . Just double the C degrees and add 30 and you'll be close. '0'C is the same as 32F.

context: It is curious that we find an abundance of diverse life on Earth in every nook and cranny, but we can't find a single microbe anywhere else in our solar system.

replies.context: Life only comes from life. Life only exists where the Source of All Life puts it.

says you and your false god and book of myths...
You never did define what life is either.

Nobody has ever defined "life" ‚Äì not with a definition that stands up to scrutiny. Didn't you know that? Of course, you know that. What a terribly dishonest argument!

Not you nor anyone else has ever seen life arise from non-life. I am quite confident that life only comes from life.

I don't have a false god. I was created by the true, living God. A false god cannot create life or anything else. Only a true, living God can create life. Your statements are nonsensical.
-------------------------------------

Let me add this ...

If you don't know what life is then you're not qualified to be in this conversation.

Absolutely hilarious nonsense!!!
First you state nobody has ever defined life, then you close with "if you don't know what life is.." And in between you post "no one has ever seen life arise..."Talk about circular stupidity, LOLOL

So you BELIEVE you were created by the true, living god huh? And you know this because? Then you follow that imaginary belief with "only a true god can create life" without proof or evidence that your god is the one and only true and living god. I've got news for you, your belief, and therefore your god, reside in your imagination. Unless you can show otherwise. I am quite confident neither you nor anyone else can do that.
That makes all your posts nonsensical and disqualifies you from being in this conversation...
Bye, lipocyte. As usual you have nothing worthwhile to contribute.

As expected, when the colored cube is called on his nonsensical posts he calls names and runs away like a three year old.
Waaaaaahhhhh
The only thing any one can say is that we have not found life away from Earth. I don't know what that means.
Because we have barely looked.

So you have barely looked but you are ready to declare God dead. You might be a bit premature with your declaration. 

You tell us if we look harder we might find life. I tell you if you look harder you might find God. I testify that I have found God and I'm here to tell you that you can find him too. Maybe finding God is like finding Waldo. Maybe God is hidden in plain sight.

Based on the available evidence, that I have looked at, I would estimate the probability of existence of your god to be about equal to that of the tooth fairy.   

That of course, says nothing about the probability of life existing outside of the earth or the existence of a god or gods in general.  I'm not sure why you tie these completely unrelated topics together.   Oh yeah, your one of those dummies that thinks the earth is 6K years old... LOL

"Based on the available evidence ...".

Incorrectly stated. Here is the correct way ‚Äì 

"Based on the my interpretation of the available evidence ..."

You need to examine your premises and re-interpret the evidence. You and I have the same evidence. You and I have very different interpretations of the same evidence. You need to identify your premises and examine them to determine if they have a rational basis. Coming to a comments board and scoffing at someone you don't agree with is not the best use of your time or mental capacity.

Learn the difference between "evidence" and "interpretation of evidence." They are not the same.

No one has ever claimed that the tooth-faery is your creator or controlled your eternal destiny. Your comparison is foolish. Wrong premises lead to wrong conclusions.

Anyone who looks at the scientific evidence and concludes that the earth is only 6K years old, isn't qualified to lecture about evidence and the interpretation of it.  

Your god is a fairytale.

interpretation huh? Well let's see now, the bible has been translated many times, now in English using words that didn't even exist before the supposed first writing. And we all know what happen in translation AND interpretation.

Oh, and ALL evidence is interpreted by the individual, so there is ZERO difference.
YOU claim your god is the creator of the universe, YOU have ZERO proof, nor can you differentiate between your god and the 10,000+ others, all you have is INTERPRETATION. You need to examine your own premises. You arrogant self-righteous truth claims are just YOUR interpretation of a book of myths.
Which of the 10,000+ documented gods are you referring to? They've all been found, just ask the believers.

It means Earth is the only place that was designed for life. It means the information provided by your eyes is correct. 1) Earth is the only place you see life. 2) You only see life coming from life. Both of these are just as you see them. Believe your eyes.
We have barely even started looking for life outside of earth.  There is no way you can make such a pronouncement that isn't based on a giant cognitive bias.

Tsk tsk, drawing a false conclusion with your imaginary designer. You know, that designer who "created" the human eye with the optic nerve right at the center of the field of vision, routing the light sensing mechanism to the occipital brain lobe where neurons fill in the blanks. More like believe you imagination.
LOLOL
B'bye, lipocyte.
We can have a fun, intelligent conversations without insulting other peoples positions.
You cant have an intelligent conversation with someone that believes the earth is six thousand years old.
Not with rubix. That poster has been insulting me for months
